evidence.claim: Ohioans Home Healthcare utilizes AWS and Azure for their cloud infrastructure.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations, indicating use of standards for health data.
They implement HL7 standards for health information exchange.
Ohioans Home Healthcare supports FHIR for interoperability in healthcare systems.
Their data platforms utilize integration middleware to ensure seamless data transfer that adheres to industry standards.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of specific X12 or EDI use cases found on public pages.
